entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
